I am a house wife who loves my cat Cow.
I have many favorite childhood memories, but one that stands out is the time I went swimming in the lake with my family
i used to be in the marines.
i love animals.
i was born completely deaf.

participant_2.background:
I'd have lunch with my dog, because she's always there for me, no matter what.
i do not like vegetables.
i can also squat 400 pounds.
I enjoy listening to all sorts of music, and I love sharing my favorites with my students.
I like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs.

content.text: Hi! I am a housewife who loves my cat Cow. What do you like to do for fun?

I enjoy listening to all sorts of music and sharing my favorites with my students. I also love going to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs.
Thats awesome! I love music too. Whats your favorite band?
I really like The Beatles and Queen. My husband and I are really into classic rock.
I love The Beatles! They are one of my favorite bands too.
Awesome! I love their music. It makes me happy.
Me too! Their music has always been my go-to when I'm feeling down.
What is your favorite song by The Beatles?
That's a tough question. I have so many favorites. But I think I would have to say "Here Comes the Sun."
That's a great song! I love the lyrics.
Me too! It's so positive and uplifting.
It's one of my favorites too.
What's your favorite song by Queen?
I really like "Bohemian Rhapsody." It's such a powerful and moving song.
Me too! I love the way it builds up and then explodes into the chorus.
It's a classic for a reason
